name: Pointless Wars
description:
Pointless Wars [Alpha]

What is Pointless Wars?

Pointless Wars is an in development turn-based strategy game. Pick your heroes and adopt the best formation against the enemy you are facing. But! Winning a battle is not enough. You have to win the war!

Featuring

  • Online multiplayer match-making. - [UNDER MAINTENANCE]
  • A few heroes.
  • The dog barks when you click on it.

Not featuring

  • Tutorial (in game, see help, it may help).
  • Campaign.
  • Many game modes.
  • Lore.
  • Custom army formations.

Did you find a bug? Let us know!
